info.title: pre.dev Architect API
info.description: Generate comprehensive software specifications for coding agents. The Architect API helps you create detailed project specifications that AI coding agents can understand and implement.

post.description: Generate a comprehensive project specification quickly. Perfect for MVPs and prototypes with balanced depth and speed. Cost: 10 credits. Processing time: ~30-40 seconds.

value.input: Build a SaaS project management tool with team collaboration, real-time updates, task tracking, and time logging
Add a calendar view and Gantt chart visualization
value.currentContext: Existing task management system with list and board views, user auth, and basic team features

value.input: Build a comprehensive e-commerce platform with inventory management

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded

post.description: Generate an ultra-detailed, enterprise-grade project specification. Best for complex systems, enterprise applications, and critical projects. Cost: 50 credits. Processing time: ~2-3 minutes. Requires Solo Premium or Enterprise subscription.

value.input: Build an enterprise healthcare management platform with patient records, appointment scheduling, billing, insurance processing, and HIPAA compliance for a multi-location hospital system
Add AI-powered diagnostics, predictive analytics, and automated treatment recommendations
value.currentContext: Existing platform has patient management, scheduling, basic reporting, built with React/Node.js/PostgreSQL, serves 50+ medical practices

value.input: Build a comprehensive fintech platform with banking, investments, crypto trading, regulatory compliance, and real-time market data

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

example.message: Deep Spec requires Solo Premium or Enterprise subscription

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded

get.description: Check the status of an asynchronous specification processing request. Use this endpoint to poll for completion when you make an async request (async: true).

parameters.name: specId
parameters.description: The unique ID returned from an async spec generation request

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

404.description: Not Found - Spec ID not found

apiKeyAuth.name: x-api-key
apiKeyAuth.description: API key for authentication. Get your API key from https://pre.dev/projects/playground (Solo) or https://pre.dev/enterprise/dashboard?page=api (Enterprise)

input.description: Description of what you want to build or the feature you want to add
input.example: Build a SaaS project management tool with team collaboration and real-time updates

outputFormat.description: Output format: 'url' returns a hosted URL (default), 'markdown' returns raw markdown content

currentContext.description: CRITICAL: Existing project/codebase context. When provided, generates feature addition spec. When omitted, generates full new project spec with setup, deployment, docs, maintenance
currentContext.example: Existing Next.js app with Supabase, has auth, task CRUD, team features

docURLs.description: Optional array of documentation URLs that Architect will reference when generating specifications

async.description: If true, returns immediately with requestId for status polling. If false (default), waits for completion

file.description: Optional file to be parsed as input (e.g., existing code, documentation, requirements). Can be used alone or combined with input text

input.description: Optional additional text description when using file upload. Can be empty string if using only file

docURLs.description: JSON stringified array of documentation URLs

output.description: Primary output - the hosted spec URL or markdown content

outputFileUrl.description: URL where the spec file is hosted (downloadable markdown)

predevUrl.description: Pre.dev project URL where you can view and edit the spec

lovableUrl.description: Deep link to Lovable.dev with auto-submit prompt to implement the spec

cursorUrl.description: Deep link to Cursor with prompt to download and implement the spec

v0Url.description: Deep link to Vercel v0 with prompt to implement the spec

boltUrl.description: Deep link to Bolt.new with prompt to implement the spec

specId.description: Unique ID to poll for status (use with /api/spec-status/:specId)

_id.description: MongoDB ObjectId of the spec request

created.description: ISO timestamp when the request was created

uploadedFileShortUrl.description: Short URL for uploaded file (if file was uploaded)

uploadedFileName.description: Name of uploaded file (if file was uploaded)

output.description: Generated spec URL or markdown content (only when completed)

outputFileUrl.description: URL where the spec file is hosted (only when completed)

executionTime.description: Processing time in milliseconds (only when completed or failed)

lovableUrl.description: Deep link to Lovable.dev (only when completed)

cursorUrl.description: Deep link to Cursor (only when completed)

v0Url.description: Deep link to Vercel v0 (only when completed)

boltUrl.description: Deep link to Bolt.new (only when completed)

message.example: Fast Spec requires 10 credits. You have 5 remaining. Visit your dashboard to purchase more credits.

creditsRequired.description: Number of credits required for the operation
